name: From a Dragon's Eye
description:
From a Dragon's Eye (BETA)

Can you rescue your companion?

The Red Dragon, Animus has enchanted your companion with a deal they cannot refuse. Can you break the Dragon’s will? And win back your partner?

Created for the Brackey's Game Jam #2 (2019)

Artwork by Lewis Fox.

Made in Twine, powered by Harlowe.

a From the Chasm production, 2019.
